welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Pebble Creek, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and warm hospitality. Get ready to explore and immerse yourself in the beauty and charm of our city. We hope you enjoy your stay and make lasting memories here."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zephyrhills Airport handles all commercial flights and services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Zephyrhills Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Peter O'Knight Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Peter O'Knight Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network after agreeing to the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tampa International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Airside A
terminals.description: Airside A at Tampa International Airport serves domestic and international flights, including those operated by Delta, United, and Southwest.

terminals.name: Airside C
terminals.description: Airside C at Tampa International Airport serves domestic and international flights, including those operated by American and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Airside E
terminals.description: Airside E at Tampa International Airport serves domestic and international flights, including those operated by Frontier and Spirit.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St. Petersburg-Clearwater International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B is a smaller terminal used for regional flights and private charters.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
